selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required by the problem statement.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer in the format 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: read_diagram_angle
new_skill_specs.purpose: To read and extract the angle value from a given diagram image.
edge_cases: Diagram is unclear or has multiple angles marked.

new_skill_specs.name: map_angle_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map the identified angle value to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
edge_cases: Angle value does not match any option.
